comment.author: 53120814@N07
comment._content: Nice flying shot! This plane was huge. In his 1942 book Victory Through Air Power, Alexander P. de Seversky uses the B-19 as an example of the long range striking power of modern (for 1942) bombers. However, Seversky also points out more than once that this aircraft had been designed years before mainly as an experiment in building large planes and didn't have the required characteristics to be a true combat aircraft.
